title: My account got permanently suspended and accepted to alpha client a month later
body: Is there any way permissions can be transferred to my new account?

replies.body:
Access invites such as PBE and Alpha Client are tied to an account for life and cannot be transferred. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

If I understand the system correctly, he shouldn't even be able to get access with a behavioral restriction.

Now I'm not saying he was banned with a behavioral restriction, could just as easily be something else, but let's just say that it is. Wouldn't that be considered a bug?

There's a lot of maybes here, but for the sake of clarification, I believe it would be a good idea to make sure that the system is working as intended, and not accepting people who receive behavioral restrictions into either the PBE or Alpha Client.

We have a system in place to revoke access from accounts not abiding by the [Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/), however sometimes something slips through as is the case here. To be clear, in this instance, it doesn't look like the system was working as intended and this was more of a bug.
